caption.p: Geographical distribution of Plebotomus ariasi and Plebotomus sergenti under the pessimistic climate change scenario A2a and the optimistic climate change scenario B2a for the three time periods (2020, 2050 and 2080). Gray color indicates areas predicted to be stable for the species absence, orange color indicates areas to be gained by the species, green color indicates areas to be lost by the species and red color indicates areas to be stable for the species presence
